Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 57th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2010...
Traded from Philadelphia to Washington on 4/23/2010 (Going to WSH: 1B V. Concepcion. Going to PHI: P K. Olsen)...
Released by Washington on 9/1/2010...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 9/1/2010 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2013, off Alex Ogando (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/2013, off Scott Linebrink (SDN)...
Injured on 6/20/2014 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Traded from Oakland to Toronto on 5/1/2022 (Going to TOR: P B. Leventhal, DH V. Concepcion. Going to OAK: 2B P. Casanova)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/2/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 7/30/2023...
Injured on 8/12/2023 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
